香港不嬲都有電影公司發行歐洲藝術電影 (安樂、高先、First Distributors)

Adele新訪問https://www.mediapart.fr/journal/france/290220/cinema-francais-la-nuit-du-deshonneur?utm_content=buffer8a2f1&utm_medium=social&utm_source=Twitter_Mediapart&utm_campaign=CM
我嬲得濟翻譯咗中文

"They think they are defending the freedom of expression, in reality they are defending their monopoly of speech. What they did last night, it's us whom they are sending back into silence, obligating us to silence ourselves"

他們認為他們正在維護表達自由，事實上他們在維護自己壟斷表達自由。他們在昨晚所做的，是將我們遣返沉默，指令我們自行滅聲


"They don't want to hear our stories. And every voice that doesn't come from them or that doesn't benefit them is considered non-existent."

他們不想聽見我們的故事。所有來自外界或不利於他們的聲音都被認定為「不存在」


"They picture us as reactionaries and puritans, but it's not the Freedom Movement of the 70s that we're criticising, but the fact that this revolution hasn't been complete, that it had a conservative aspect and that the power was still attributed to the same people. With a new legislation system. In fact, we're criticising the lack of revolution."
"As if this year there wasn't anything else to say about sexual violence about cinema but is going through a crisis about police violence which is intensifying, the public hospital is deteriorating "

他們想像我們為反動派或清教徒，但我們不是在批評70年代的自由運動，這場革命仍未完成，它存在保守的一面，權力仍掌握在同一類人手上，伴隨新的法律系統。事實上，我們在批評缺乏革命。正如今年就算沒有關於性暴力或電影圈的評論，日漸加劇的警暴問題及即將崩潰的公立醫院都在受到批評


"They wanted to separate the man from the artist, today they separate artists from the world"

他們想分開藝術家與他的個人行為，今天他們把藝術家與現實世界脫離


"The whole night was centred around the idea that we couldn't say anything. How are we going to laugh now if we can't laugh about the oppressed? But what if we laugh about ourselves? if we laughed about the dominant ones?"

整個頒獎晚上的意念都是關於我們不能發聲。試問我們如何能夠因被壓迫而歡笑？ 但我們何不為自己歡呼？我們何不取笑那些掌握優勢的人？


(英文翻譯來自https://twitter.com/Portrait_Nation/status/1233759796668571654?s=19)

Under the terms of the plea agreement, the court ordered Polanski to report to a state prison for a 90-day psychiatric evaluation, but granted a stay to allow him to complete his current project. Under the terms set by the court, he traveled to Europe to complete filming.[29] Polanski returned to California and reported to Chino State Prison for the evaluation period beginning on 19 December 1977, and was released after 42 days.

Polanski's attorneys assert that the judge suggested to them that he would send the director to prison and order him deported.[5] In response to the threat of imprisonment, Polanski bought a one-way ticket to England and fled the United States.[2] Shortly after Polanski fled, Rittenband denied he ever did anything that the 2008 documentary would go on to allege, by issuing the following statement (in 1978):

I then stated that an appropriate sentence would be for Mr. Polanski to serve out the remainder of the 90-day period for which he had been sent to Chino, provided Mr. Polanski were to be deported by the Immigration and Naturalization Bureau, by stipulation or otherwise, at the end of the 90 days. I expressly stated that I was aware that the court lacked authority to order Mr. Polanski deported directly or as a condition of probation. However, based on the facts before me, I believed that the safety and welfare of the citizens of California required that Mr. Polanski be kept out of circulation for more than 90 days. However, since Mr. Polanski is an alien who had pleaded guilty to an act of moral turpitude, I believe that the interests of the citizens of California could be adequately safeguarded by a shorter jail term if Mr. Polanski would thereafter absent himself from the country.

replies.msg:
我唔覺得Céline會為咗鋪一個場面而格硬迫佢地嘈交
成個愛情主軸寫緊都係佢同Adèle嘅關係，而佢地之前分得手就有原因，所以大家可以向套戲D細節到dig deep估下。Céline寫野都好細緻，正如佢唔會為左happy ending而拍佢地最後對望/私奔，同樣佢都唔會為咗要有最後個相擁而冇啦啦鬧交，鬧交呢個本來就係M&H之間嘅暗湧。因為比起H，M係成個故事中較父權色彩嘅角色，而成個故事發展就係源於佢地之間嘅衝突。雖然中間M有因為H而變番feminine，但前一晚餵水係提示番觀眾佢個主動/陽剛色彩仲未甩到，所以第二日佢先會又忘記咗女性處境去怪責番H唔反抗。而最後沙灘相擁就係講緊M終於肯放棄自己舊嗰種父權色彩同H融為一體。
餵野除左同調情入性有關之外，仲係講緊主導權，可以refer番下女誘罪，伯爵最後想姦小姐嗰時，小姐就係用餵酒去主導番段關係。。但明明燒女成套戲個主導權一直都係向H手上，點解Céline會特登寫M餵水？除咗鋪第二日鬧交之後真係諗唔到 因為佢拍sex scene都專登用新手法似有還無，餵水呢D咁有性意味嘅old school象徵佢更加唔會專登為拍而拍，佢拍得就係有野想講。Céline呢套電影向外國評價咁高，就係因為佢電影語言用得好，好多野係隱含收埋咗向畫面入面而唔突兀。如果單獨抽一兩個element出嚟講可能會以為諗多咗，但你連番成個脈落去睇就會發現係順。
電影語言好難一時三刻解釋得好清楚，但你睇得多大師級作品就會明佢地D鏡位、場景真係有度過計過象徵D乜野、有咩hidden meaning。例如Psycho入面D標本setting、人物坐位企位鏡位，全部都有得分析有得解。行外人可能覺得有D穿鑿附會feel，但呢個係電影研究嘅一部分。華文好少有呢類電影語言研究，關於女同性戀電影就更加少見 。Orange大大咁樣每個象徵抽綜合番女性主義、同志影視作品共通性、導演特色出嚟講，係有好參考價值。
所以你見Criterion Collection未公映就光速收藏燃女，就知呢套戲係大師級水準、電影語言出色，所以每樣element係一定有意思、唔會怕over-interpret，只爭在拆得（解讀）得岩唔岩。
